title: MD
biography: Dr. C Palanivelu is a well known surgeon in the state of Tamil Nadu, India.
aiSummary: C. Palanivelu is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 28 at GI laparoscopic surgery (Member). Has been published in International Journal of Medical Science and Public Health. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
